snippet.title: Cralon - Announcement Trailer (English)
snippet.description:
Cralon is an authentic 3d dungeon crawler with RPG and adventure elements, inspired by the ultimate underground classics.
Hunting a demon, you fell into the abyss of an old mine, stuck in the darkness. Finding your way out, you meet strange creatures and new friends, solve quests and riddles, fight the dark and evil monsters, face your fears and uncover the dungeon's secret.

Wishlist now!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3440060/Cralon
Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/p/cralon-12e9d3
Website: https://pithead-studio.com/

#cralon #pithead #pitheadstudio #indiedev #gamedev
